thread.title: Usher and Harry Belafonte talk activism, art - Canada.com
thread.title_full: Usher and Harry Belafonte talk activism, art - Canada.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Canada.com
title: Usher and Harry Belafonte talk activism, art - Canada.com
text:
As he considered his growing commitment to activism, Usher only needed to look at the man seated next to him, Harry Belafonte, to know how much more he could give. "Unfortunately, no matter what I say I'm never going to be able to upstage ," the million-selling musician joked during a weekend appearance at the 92nd Street Y in Manhattan.
 Canada.com.
